PERSONAE.TITLE: Dramatis Personae

PGROUP.GRPDESCR: servants to the Countess of Rousillon.

PERSONAE.PERSONA: COUNTESS OF ROUSILLON, mother to Bertram.
HELENA, a gentlewoman protected by the Countess.

PGROUP.GRPDESCR: neighbours and friends to the Widow.

PERSONAE.PERSONA: Lords, Officers, Soldiers, c., French and Florentine.

SCENE.TITLE: SCENE I. Rousillon. The COUNT's palace.
SCENE.STAGEDIR: Enter BERTRAM, the COUNTESS of Rousillon, HELENA, and LAFEU, all in black

SPEECH.SPEAKER: COUNTESS
SPEECH.LINE: In delivering my son from me, I bury a second husband.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: BERTRAM
SPEECH.LINE: And I in going, madam, weep o'er my father's death
anew: but I must attend his majesty's command, to
whom I am now in ward, evermore in subjection.

SPEECH.SPEAKER: LAFEU
SPEECH.LINE: You shall find of the king a husband, madam; you,
sir, a father: he that so generally is at all times
good must of necessity hold his virtue to you; whose
